lead_paragraph: An armed man who believed he was confronting an intruder in the basement of his home instead fatally shot his 14-year-old son, the police said.
snippet: An armed man who believed he was confronting an intruder in the basement of his home instead fatally shot his 14-year-old son, the police said.

headline.main: Ohio: Man Fearing an Intruder Kills 14-Year-Old Son
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Man Fearing An Intruder Shoots His 14-Year-Old Son To Death
